wiki.content:
Insightful acoustic performance and vocals by Clapton.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Insightful acoustic performance and vocals by Clapton.

track.name: Blue Eyes Blue
comments: I thought that too Eric, I'm still here alone too.  Great song. He did make my blue eyes blue too! Slowhands you play it so well!!!!!
A lovely blues from eric with great lyrics.
there's so much more to Clapton than the hits...amazing talent!
Play the blues Eric....Keep it real man
Great song, such strong lyrics. I like the backing vocals here.
So amazing... got to know this song through the Soundtrack for Runaway Bride and totally fell in love with it :)
